thread.title: Hear Passion Pit's Eclectic New Song 'Somewhere Up There' - Rolling Stone
thread.title_full: Hear Passion Pit's Eclectic New Song 'Somewhere Up There' - Rolling Stone

title: Hear Passion Pit's Eclectic New Song 'Somewhere Up There' - Rolling Stone
text:
Hear Passion Pit's Eclectic New Song 'Somewhere Up There' Synth-pop outfit unveils second track in as many days Passion Pit unveiled a sprawling and eclectic new song, "Somewhere Up There," the group's second offering in as many days. 
Passion Pit unveiled a sprawling and multifaceted new song, "Somewhere Up There," the synth pop outfit's second release in as many days. Related Passion Pit Singer on Battling Mental Illness and Taking New Songs on the Road 'It's all-encompassing,' says Michael Angelakos of living with bipolar disorder 
The track opens with a sparkling synth arpeggio that builds steadily towards the bombastic under the direction of Michael Angelakos' warped and winding falsetto. Several minutes in, however, the track stops and restarts as an R&B-tinged instrumental grove that morphs vibrantly but also ends abruptly. 
What follows is a spoken word section about the bonds between mothers and newborns that gives way to an extended atmospheric outro. After the music fades, "Somewhere Up There" closes with a voice mail from Angelakos' mom. 
"Somewhere Up There" follows "Inner Dialogue," which Passion Pit released Monday alongside the news that Angelakos was launching a new company that would offer legal, educational and healthcare support to musicians. 
Last December, Angelakos released, Merry Christmas, Mr. Fields , a holiday-themed soundtrack and "video album." Passion Pit's last album, Kindred , arrived in 2015. More News
